description: Variation of condition 1 of Planning Permission dated 1 August 2020 (RN: 20/03455/FULL) for Excavation of basement beneath house with associated lightwell to rear, erection of a two-storey side extension, alterations to two-storey rear extension at second floor level, erection of single storey rear extension, instillation of new windows, alterations at main roof level including the installation of rooflights and other alterations. NAMELY to vary the approved drawing numbers to propose a redesigned single storey rear extension.
